metadata.title: Grab Samples and Video Images of Bottom Habitat during Trawling

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description:
Compare physical and biological variable between trawled areas before and after experimental trawling by using closed trawling vs. un-closed trawled Using acoustic - echo - images.  There will be 6 Stations, each will collect (1)  cores-grabs (2)  video transect (3)  ASP and (4) VanVeen grab.

An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Support NPMR project "Purpose is to Determine the impact of commercial trawling on the Bering Sea"

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
